name: Burger King
description: Well-known fast-food chain serving grilled burgers, fries & shakes.
address: Burger King, 8575 Sea Island Wy, Richmond, BC V6X 0A8

detailed_reviews.review_text: Service was ok the food was fresh and tasty the workers are nice and i love the ghost pepper nuggets chicken fries and mozzarella cheese stick there were nice highly recommend is just the floor is trashy Parking: I had to squeeze my car in because there were no space to park

Tried the new Impossible Whoppers (2 for a family member and I), absolutely excellent experience. Reasonably quick wait time from order to prep and staff were friendly in the drive through. The food was hot, fries were clearly fresh and crispy, drinks were carbonated and cold. The burger itself was amazing! I ve had some terrible fast food experiences in the past and this was a shockingly good one. Keep it up folks! Thank you. I was there today Sat, May 8th @ approximately 1:10 PM.
After all, hamburgers are Whoppers. Tall Indian. He was kind, so it tasted better. I need to come here sometime. The store was also cleaner than other franchise stores. Food
Nice place,not crowded Food quality is good as always. Food
Great drinks, great burgers for lunch and breakfast and lunch Overall a solid place to eat at Food : 4/5
Had a drive thru this evening. The lady was very willing to help and give recommendations! Nice experience!

Wanted a hamburger at 5am, and other restaurants were serving breakfast. Made the trip to Richmond from Vancouver just for burgers! No regrets at all. The service was awesome, and the food was fresh and delicious. At BK, you really can have it your way!
Employees were really kind and helpful. Very clean and nice place and food was fresh and well made. Two thumbs up
It was kinda slow but haven t had Burger King in a while and it was great 2 whoppers for $10 was also a great deal
This is the best burger king ever, serve fresh and hot food always, friendly staff. Best in town!
Always Great burgers and service! very nice staff! Food
Ok. im there for the food, strictly. The people at this location especially in the evening, are pretty awful. Not friendly, kinda rude and condescending. Buutttt the food is good, so i put up with it

I had an amazing experience at this Drive thru, especially with Aman and Parminder, cuz of their smile, the service attitude of both of them is very very good, efficient fast and accurate service, and food was fresh and hot. They both show passion for their job at Burger King, both show respect for customers, thank you Aman and Parminder for your excellent customer service and your sunshine smiley faces! (Even with the mask on, I can feel you two are smileing behind the mask), both show that they love their job. Keep up the good work! (Other crew members I don t know their name, I also would say a thank you so very much because they also show passion for their job here at BK and they also have fast and accurate service too!) . Everytime I get burgers and drinks here, I feel very welcomed by the friendly staff members here, and food is fresh hot and tasty, this drive thru shows how a real Burger King should be. I recommend food from here. The warm tasty burgers made by the crew members here, are like burgers made from their warm hearts! Keep up the excellent work! Cheers!
Very good food and drinks for all family
Best Burger King always has their deals $1 ice cream available- other Burger Kings not so much
Great offer, great food, good service and atmosphere!
Perfect place for your cravings!! Nice staff and location

I have been here a few times for breakfast since Ive moved near by. I would have to say the service has been amazing and their food preparation have been top notch. 5 stars definitely recommend this location for breakfast.

Nashville Hot Chicken is pretty good. If it s too spicy you can ask for extra mayo to reduce the heat on your tastebuds. The bun is soft and tasty and mixes well with the sauces. Quality of chicken is what you d expect from a fast food place. Grab it for  free  with a minimum spend of $1 from their website.  The regular price isn t cheap otherwise, but why not treat yourself once in a while with $8 fast food chicken lol
We all know this place. In my opinion, its under rated. The burgers are decently sized, fair for the price, and tastes amazing for a fast food restaurant. Definitely not the Burger King though.
The best Burger, I like it  .

That wednesday combo was absolutely mind blowing , Pickles salad and tomates and wish i ordered with mayo epicy .... Absolutely king ... Thank you for suggesting that i can only pick the burger the second time without fries and drink and cost less... God bless
Super delicious. There is no burger like a grilled burger with lots of fresh ingredients.
Very good services by shine and Lovepreet
burgers warm, chicken nuggets are tasty, and fries are hot in drive thru. On intercom, you MUST speakup to get order right. Also, inform employee how much sauce you want.

name: Burger King
description: Well-known fast-food chain serving grilled burgers, fries & shakes.
address: Burger King, 821 Granville St, Vancouver, BC V6Z 1K9

detailed_reviews.review_text: I cant believe I havent reviewed this Burger King yet. This place is legendary. If youre a super posh person who cant handle the real world, this Burger King isnt for you. That said, all kinds of people frequent this Burger King. Of course there are individuals, I know someone who got ripped off by an individual in this Burger King. There are also regular working people, office people, young people, and tourists. Usually they always have posters up for items that sold out long ago. They have a really large menu with a lot of customizability. I always found the staff to be nice and patient with me, even though I have yet to memorize the Burger King menu, and always need to read it when I get to the front. When youre standing at the front waiting for your food, it feels really tense, like a contest, because some things take forever, and you could get your food way earlier or way later than you expect. Not just anybody can use the bathrooms, they would be too prone to abuse in a location like this, the bathrooms are for paying customers only. No shenanigans. I like the music they play in here, its always pleasant. Generally 70s music with a leaning towards soul. The Angry Whopper is dope, I like that, I get it with no cheese because Im lactose intolerant. I want to try and see if they have any spicy chicken tenders or nuggets. This is a lively and fun establishment. To be honest, I like to go to Jollibee first and order a two piece chicken, eat that, and then smuggle the Jollibee gravy in my pocket and use it for the Burger King fries. I havent gotten banned yet. I usually go during off hours in the afternoons, and there are a lot of individuals. Right now Im here at lunch and it is very orderly and normal. Kind of disappointing, really. Vegetarian options: They have a vegetarian burger. Dietary restrictions: You can ask for no cheese. Wheelchair accessibility: Seems like you could make it through the double doors. Floor is flat.
Good food relative to price, friendly staff. Kid-friendliness: Nice gift for our kid everytime, thank you, BK! Food : 4/5 |
Temperature, speed, and taste magnificent. The zesty mustard was out of this world! Cheeseburgers, ice creams, pops perfectly right. Please close the washrooms for good. Well be back! Food : 5/5

I have been an at least twice a week customer since the location on main St closed...what a shame that was and still is! I would recommend this restaurant to anyone...the staff is amazing..especially the cheerful Philippine lady who always tries to make everyone happy and smile...easy to do when she allows me to buy strawberry sauce separately for my pancakes!!! Sometimes I gotta but a whole sundae but how kool is it that during breakfast hours u can get a sundae!!! Gotta love that...thats really having it your way!!! If thats what BKs slogan is...then they better continue to make it happen!!! If I was ever denied my strawberry   pancakes that would send my whole day into a tailspin!!! All thou theres always a selection or should I say cddscquite a collection of colorful people that frequent this location,..hey Im a proud East Van guy so u could say those kinda people are my kinda people...If ur from around here u get what I am saying! All the foods great...I tend to order allot of roadhouse burgers and whatever burger I chose...BBQ sauce and onion rings usually find their way onto them...oh yeah..how awesome is it that u can get onion rings instead of fries for no charge extra..that is what makes BK the best. My one complaint would b the increase of two dollars in only a year for the king meal Deal...that almost...well lets hope it stays at 7$ for a long time...to end this on a positive..go to bk and grab a cone..only a buck..and there wicked.

Love their burgers and Oreo shake is my favorite they are open 24hours everyday which is a good thing And also the place is very clean and the staff is very friendly and quick in making the meals I have visited this place several times Vegetarian options: There are few meals targeted to vegetarians and we can always customize our meal And have extra pickles, onions or tomatoes Kid-friendliness: The place is very spacious and clean Wheelchair accessibility: They have separate washrooms to facilitate people in wheelchairs
I am regular at this place and this place is at amazing location with amazing staff.. Very friendly and always serve good quality food. 100% recommended.
Service wasnt that good but food was ok. Its been a while since I ate at Burguer King and was nice to do it again.

Another one of my favorite places to stop and eat, the prices are very fair, and the food is delicious  .  The staff there are very kind and courteous. Its always clean and tidy. And I love the atmosphere. Very cool and hip.

Popped in here just before six pm while shopping - I just had a Whopper; hadnt had one in years and I worked at a BK as a teen...Anyway, I was just amazed by the service.  Kind, patient guy at the front - not sure his name but he was wearing a grey puffy vest and baseball type cap, and I marveled as I watched him with some more difficult customers at how gentil and warm he was.  Lovely to see in a fast food place.

Excellent Whopper. Excellent staff. There were two Indian guys Dharma and Aman. Their service was amazing. I have never had such a service experience at any fast food restaurant. I will be back for sure!!

I was inconvenienced by the app today, which charged me multiple times for an order I didnt want as soon as I opened the app. I was irritable and I think a bit rude with the kind cashier at the front counter who was trying her best to work through the line, with many complicated orders. I know they are not responsible for the app (terrible app) and I will gladly order from them at the counter instead if/when I come back again. They are always professional and efficient. This is a good location.

As one of the only places on Granville that is open 24 hours on the weekend, I MUST give this place a 5 star review. They even let all the drunks use their bathroom, which cant be nice for them to deal with after the fact, but Im sure it saves people on a regular basis. Add to that the fact that the food is great, as BK always is, and you have a winning combination!
The 2 can dine is great value. I recommend ordering online in advance. Generally excellent service and experience, except for the occasional cold chip or stale bun.

Before Burger King I havent eaten a burger in fast-food chain for a decade but once I tried out with a coupon I was pleasantly surprised. Since then I visit burger King at least once a month. Staff are efficient and polite. Whopper and fries are delicious
Good food and friendly staff

Staff are very polite and quick with taking orders. Overall cleanliness is great, place is kept clean even when super busy. Slight error on the Restaurant s business hours though, Sunday to Tuesday they re open from 7am and close at 10:30pm and from Wednesday they open 7am and the store is open 24hours until Sunday evening. I highly recommend this Burger King location!

These people are doing really great. Saurav, was amazing with his service. I went there with my wife and ordered burger. They quickly made the food and was very organized. We definitely will go there again.

Best management team. Staff perform like a well oiled machine.  Always suggestive selling. Place is clean. Food is hot and fresh. Fries were crisp.  They are able to move large amounts of peple through quickly.

The staff here were the most polite group of young people I have ever come across in fast food. These young guys actually want to be working. Unlike other fast food places where the young people are total jerks, these guys were awesome. Great service, and this time, very good HOT food unlike many other BK locations.
Good spot to eat late at night. The staff were kind and respectful.
Very nice people working in this place and they served hot food hot cold food cold fast
This is the best BK fish sandwich Ive ever had. Please teach the US franchises your recipes.
Went in for a couple of whopper burgers and it was some of the best Ive had in a long time. Fresh buns, fresh veggies and the meat taste like meat. Good work!
It was really good food, also cheap and delicious, my order was very fast, so I enjoyed a lot it s a good place if you are hungry or in a hurry
Great restaurant clean and service is amazing by Dharma.

name: Burger King
description: Well-known fast-food chain serving grilled burgers, fries & shakes.
address: Burger King, 612 W Pender St, Vancouver, BC V6B 1V8

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had an Impossible burger and poutine delivered to my hotel. My first time trying poutine. Is the cheese supposed to be melted? I thought that cheese curds were supposed to be in separate lumps  It was good but a the gravy was a bit salty for my taste.
Fantastic service from Dave. Ill be back. BK should roll out more vegetarian/vegan options though. Its 2022
Love this place    king burger is awesome

I go to this place very regularly for lunch. They always give fresh food, delicious and up to the standards. Costumer service is very great and professional by the staff. But there are always homeless people in the store, creating mess. Even they create problems for costumers and staff.

Fantastic and quick customer service by a lady name as Meera she always treat me with a smile . Along with that store is very clean and food is really tasty and fresh  I visit 3 to 4 times in week to have their tasty food..

This is a wonderfully-enjoyable and great social atmosphere to go to for any time of the day and especially when you only have a very time limited lunch break this is the best take or eat in place to visit . The staff are very upbeat and are eager to take your order and serve it to you in with a respected haste.So no long waits to not look forwards to! This all comes from my own awesome experience in frequenting this restaurant! I give this eatery a huge 5 star rating folks ! Its a must to check out for yourselves you wont be disappointed cheers yall! And good day! From Lisa

My always go to place. The staff is so nice and they actually remember their customers and always greet well. Meera, one of the staff is always so prompt and shes very active. My order always come quick and they make it so nice.

I live very close and sometimes I go there for some quick food , the staff it s always very attentive and patient , they are all hard workers ,David the guy at the front really makes an effort to do his best and you can tell , I have no complaints about this place at all .
The restaurant is very clean, food was fresh and hot, quality was up to the standards. The staff is really professional. I recommend this store for good and tasty food.

The service was excellent and I received my order very promptly and when I checked my order , ( like I do with all fast-food restaurants ), not a single thing was missing ! Also , being opened 24/7 is a great convenience for those die-hard burger eaters who get those cravings @ 2-5 am !

This bk in pender street is very nice...friendly staff and fresh food .this is a wonderfully - enjoyble and great social atmosphere to go to for any time of the day and especially when you only have a time limited break this is the take or eat in place to visit...So no long waits to not look forwords to !this all comes from my own awesome experience in this restaurant ..
Excellent service and food. Dave and Aman are doing really great job and taking care of their customers. Can recommend to anyone whos looking for a quick bite.

I always have great experience here compared with the other locations in the lower mainland ...food was fresh and pretty hot as usual. My last visit they messed up my sandwich but thats ok we all mess up from time to time. Its all about how this error was handled and treated that means the most to me. They fixed it fast and with a sense of urgency I very much appreciated   there was no hassle about doing a  remake, they appologized and made a new one on the fly.  Thats how employee mistakes should be handled but rarely arenin this city   other restaurants in van could benefit from this obvious display of fantastic customer service!! Its def a hard thing to find lately.  Thanks BK for renewing my faith in customer service !! I wish I had the girls name , it happened last Fri, Nov 2,2018 during the early  evening hours  and she deserves a goodhuge applause!!

Excellent customer service and thank you for the service. The foods outstanding the service was Marriott standards.uou you want a great meal with excellent customer service. This burger king is your spot

Hello, just wanted to let you guys know that in the burger king west pender they have some really friendly people working. i recently had forgotten my purse inside the burgerking where they found it and called me right away to let me know me forgotten my purse and told me they would keep it until I come back to grab it. thumbs up  for the manager named mahay

Hey there this is where my bro & I go for Whopper Wednesday then we go to our drinks Sr8 afterwards down at Harbour Centre Liq (Hires Rootbeer) & (Hey Yall Hard Ice-T)... then we go across and enjoy our well deserved benefits...

Very quick, friendly staff. There is a lot of garbage around, but its a busy area & they are short-staffed, so it would help if lazy patrons actually picked up their own garbage instead of expect someone else to do it for them.
I must say my visit at the burger king was very nice. extremely fast.  The food was delicious hot and services were excellent

Burger King, the one stop shop for gluttony!!! Succulent, crunchy, & sweet, this naughty menu will transform you from saint, to sinner, forevermore. For the irresponsible eater in all of us, Burger King!!!
Flame broiled what else need be said. A welcome choice in the fast burger industry. Large restaurant, clean and efficient.
Really really friendly staff working behind the counter. They forgot my onion rings but were very quick and kind, in getting them to my table.
Great fast food restaurant in our area So glad youre here. Love your milkshakes.
Friendly customer service and good burgers
People go to mcdonald to est big mac. Here its whopper taste like burger queen.
Big king burger is one of a hell tasty burger plus it is cheap compared to others. I love it. Service was fast and everything was tidey and awesome.

name: Burger King
description: Well-known fast-food chain serving grilled burgers, fries & shakes.
address: Burger King, 801 Marine Dr Unit 700, North Vancouver, BC V7P 3K6

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is my favorite BK. Staff are friendly, helpful and doing their best to keep area and tables clean. Dining is large enough with plenty sitting tables and stools. Free parking lot in front. Food quality is good and free refill for drinks available. BK has always good offers if install the App or use coupons. Save your time and money  with order ahead by mobile app is the best choice.
I had my lunch in this location today. I had a good experience. Alex was a nice young man friendly and without attitude who helped me with my order. I will definitely come back.
Whopper Wednesdays you get a few dollars off on whoppers and it s the greatest thing since Obama
Lady was super helpful and beautiful and wickly kind and thoughtful
Good tasting, cheap food (use app).
Amazing every time. Nothing beats a Whopper.
Check the website and get SPECIAL OFFER meals for only 6.99 you get 2 burgers, french fries or onion rings and also pop.
Excellent service, very friendly staff, great food!
Great experience, very helpful staff, very tasty foodstuffs

My wife and i had gotten very fresh and delicious Whopper,s and fresh fries & awesome onion rings. and the person who took our order , said hello, and smiled and asked,what can i get for your order,s? We were very happy with our order,s keep up the good work everyone. And there resturaunt is always clean. also the customers social distance, there is markers on the floors . We were wondering do you grill the onions if we ask? or are they always raw onions? just curious.  Thanks. 5 Stars for service and the delicious Meals.
Love the recipes. BKs breakfast menus are now my fav.
Definitely a good atmosphere. To get a haircut. Youre definitely treated like family, and the barbers are very experienced
These guys are great. Had a wonderful experience dining in. Great customer service and the dining area was clean as well. Food was delicious.
Been here three times now, food is fresh and hot and quick. Service is good not great but who cares theyre efficient and always got my order correct.
My whopper had the freshest toppings Ive ever seen for a fast food restaurant. My burger was assembled very neatly and the fries were perfectly cooked with the right amount of salt.

Went there for whopper Wednesday. So goooood! Staff is alright, this owner/manager who comes in to help on Wednesday is great. Just wish the opened later, considering their competition opens late and at least have 24hour drive thrus and that they are the only BK on the North Shore.
The shake machine was broken and one of the bathrooms was out of service. Other than this, the food was great and the service was fast, friendly and efficient.
Good burger king.  Good staff. Clean.

I love a good whopper... the best burgers in the fast food world will be found at Burger King. My personal favourite is a double whopper meal with poutine and a vanilla shake. I always hate myself after eating it but its quite a fast food experience

The best fast food restaurant i have been to. The classic whopper meal with chicken fries and a medium mango juice. The chicken fries was extremely smooth. You can taste the chicken melted in the cheese. And a barbecue dipping sauce made my experience spectacular. Just as i enjoyed my moment with one chicken fries as starters i very amused. The classic whopper sandwich contained with fresh vegetables, salty pickle and the fresh juicy taste of tomato. The classic whopper sandwich with processed cheddar cheese and the ounce of pure beef meat. The melted cheese in the meat combined with mayo ketchup and mustered. The classic whopper burger was the best burger i have ever had in my entire life.
Staff is nice and food is better than the Burnaby ones that I used to go to
Whopper is way better than Macs
Good food and location
YUMMY! I forgot how good this food was! Great app with awesome coupons. We ordered extra to take home it was so cheap!
The service was great.   The coffee was great.   The apple pies were ok, cooked perfectly, but the flavor was not all that great!

name: Burger King
description: Well-known fast-food chain serving grilled burgers, fries & shakes.
address: Burger King, 4700 Kingsway Unit 1200e, Burnaby, BC V5H 4M1

detailed_reviews.reviewer_name: This channel only occasionally comments on vids
detailed_reviews.review_text: Whopper   whopper   whopper   whopper Junior    Double 2  Triple 3  Whopper Flame   Grilled Taste   With perfect   toppers I rule   this day Lettuce    Mayo Pickle   Ketchup Its OK   If I dont   want that Impossible   or Bacon   Whopper Any whopper   My way You rule  , youre seizin the day! At BK Have it your way You rule!

Had pesto chicken burger here at this location three weeks ago and it was superb . I tried same burger at other location but idk why it was as good as I got from here . So fresh , chicken was tender and tempting . I loved it !! .
this Burger King is in the mall food court. The Burger King app doesnt work too well because it stops after 5:00 p.m. but this location is open later.

The star of the food court. So affordable (please don t raise price, love) and fast. If you go there often the people will remember you. I prefer everything here over McDonald s. Recommend grabbing some nuggets here for movies.
Came back today and it was great And service was very fast and courteous

Have the best experience everytime I am in there. Aabas who seems to be the manager is always outgoing and pleasant. One girl (I forget her name) makes my son an ice cream cone every Wednesday and we have a lot of fun as she tries to make the perfect cone each weeks cone better then the last.
Delicious burgers! The original chicken sandwich and the Whopper are my favorite! The staff is friendly and they have sports on TV!!
Busy on Wednesdays when discounted Whoppers are on for $2.99. Note: price might be higher at other stores (ie at Highgate Mall is 50C/ more).
Dont clown around, go with the King! Whoppers are solid, service is quick. Good deals every day of the week
This location is always good! Always has polite staff too!
Always get what I ordered and always consistent love this location!
An excellent place to grab your meal at a cheap rate.
Fast and friendly service, food came out fresh and hot. Thank you!
Awesome fast food. And good prices.
Best fast food burger
Nice place. Friendly cashier, yummy sandwiches.
Love the cheese stick and nice customer service
Had a tasty burg with a tasty friend
They have a wide range of products at cheap rates.must visit
Good food and good customer service!!!
Great offers at cheap prices...
Great service, quick and prompt.
Good food friendly people
Easy and fast to order
Love their Whoppers!

name: Burger King
description: Well-known fast-food chain serving grilled burgers, fries & shakes.
address: Burger King, Denman Place Ma, 1030 Denman St, Vancouver, BC V6G 2M6

detailed_reviews.review_text: Omg I never never go to Burger King, I just was vanished also heard they served a great pouting. That said place my order got it quite fast and fresh. No problem at the counter it was quiet. However within the following half hour 3 girls showed up and started to berate the young lady seving and demanded keys to the washroom    then the 3 young girls stated to harass clients  but seemed to be afraid in pestering the likes of me. It lasted over 45 minutes and only once another employee made her entrance back to the store did it escalate to a point the police was to be called within the next 5 to 8 minutes of sarcasm and fowl language they left. Sadly theses young ladies had nothing better to do then to harass the hard-working young girl who had remained  polite quiet and silent despite the repeated attempts to make her feel like a piece of s@$$%t . Knowing well enough the wages the staff earn doesnt equate the verbal abuse she had to endure. So please be patient be kind be safe  and I assure you that whenever I stop by that place I will ensure that I stopped by eat a bite Knowing that who served me, his truly an amazing person who deserves all of my gratitude for a job well done. BTW: the pouting is affordable and awesome. Burgers  as good as any fast food
i like  atmosphere here and restaurant is very clean .last but not least service of employee was  very nice they are very friendly Thank you Food

The onion rings and the FF today were perfect!! Also the whoppers. I must mention that thank goodness the washrooms are not available anymore! Therefore there are not people coming in and out like a public restroom, homeless that stink are no longer here and the place feels fresh and clean... Whoever decided to shut down the washrooms deserve a standing ovation, thank you! I am definitely coming back more often!

I went there today near about 6:30pm .i think the guy working at front was new .he seems confused but the girl working at back was so good at her job. Store was busy  she was doing all the back work and also giving instructions to the guy. I had to wait for few minutes for my order but the food was amazing .keep up the good work

Such a low rating. Why? Its a fastfood joint with fast service. Jan 16th 11am my family went in and got great service. She was working alone and still knew what she was doin. Please give this lady a metal. Thank you.

Let me say that Burger King have the best burgers on the market. Well A&W come a close second. But back to Burger King burgers,  it had fresh tomatoes, fresh lettuce,  100% beef, it was The Ultimate Burger it was cooked to just perfect where the meat was still juicy but not pink. You would have to be a fool not too crowded this Burger Kings Burgers.
On of the few burger kings around Vancouver.  There happens to be parking so I was able to pick up a whopper with the phone app to get a 2 for $9.
Fast food. Good staff.
Staffs do there best nd the place is super.I really liked the burgers.Employees really working hard .Excellent service nd the employees know how to handle a thought crowd.Keep it up.

My local midnight snack place! Many of these places are all the same however the one thing that is different here is the staff are incredibly friendly and work very hard. The food is always hot and fresh unlike other places I have been too.
You gotta give it to the two ladies working there, excellent service and they know how to handle a tough crowd during rush hour, dinner time.... Fair play to them keep it up

Burger King is and will always be one of the best tasting Burgers       that Ive had i absolutely love     their milkshake and frys too!!! You are going to wanna check these burgers for yourself and a milkshake or two

Overworked and understaffed, yet they never provide subpar service (at least none that Ive experienced). And considering this is near English Bay in Denman, the folks that stop by are quite the chatacters. The crew here are just   .
Impossible Whopper is the best!
I really liked the burgers. Gotta appreciate the only 2 employees working there. They are really working hard. Keep it up.
Probably my favourite burger king. Staff is friendly, quality is good!
I love the atmosphere  here
I visited many time there l and this is best place to eat because of tasty food and friendly staff.
I DONT GO MUCH BUT ITS ALWAYS NICE TO HAVE A WHOOPER MEAL, AND THE POUTINE IS GREAT...
They have a 2 burger + fries + drink special for $5. Pretty awesome deal.
Great place to eat Food is good and cheap. Service is very friendly. Always make this a stop when  im in the west end.
Awesome Staff and great food service and Love the Whopper
Tasty food, fresh burger, recommended everyone to visit burger king to get various deals
The one place with an actual public bathroom that I could not find in that whole area. Very helpful if you cant find a bathroom and need to use it
Great little restaurant.  Love your burgers.
